name: Scream Hazard
description:
Oh no! Imps are hunting you but you cannot attack. The only way to retaliate is to stay close to them until you scream out of fear. Who would have thought Imps do not like screams. Can you survive for 2 minutes?

Play with WASD or arrow keys. Keep close to the enemies until your stress bar is filled to unleash a deadly scream

Made in 3 hours for the 207th Trijam. The theme was "Run towards the danger"
